summary: Rebranding from 'Enerzia Power Solutions' to 'Workhub Enerzia' and 5-hub navigation reorganization - All features verified and working correctly

issues: Header still shows 'Enerzia Power Solutions' from organization settings (dynamic value from DB) - this is expected behavior as it comes from settingsAPI.getOrganization()

critical_code_review_comments: Login page correctly displays 'Workhub Enerzia' branding with proper styling
Sidebar shows 'Workhub' with 'Enerzia' below it in the logo section
All 5 main hub buttons are visible: Company Hub, My Workspace, Departments, Management, Administration
HTML title correctly set to 'Workhub Enerzia'
PWA manifest.json updated with 'Workhub Enerzia' name and 'Workhub' short_name
Navigation links route correctly to their respective pages
Departments hub contains 8 sub-departments: Projects, Accounts, Sales, Purchase, Exports, Finance, HR & Admin, Operations
Each department has its own expandable sub-menu with relevant links
Auto-expansion of sections based on current route works correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Rebranding to 'Workhub Enerzia' is complete. The 5-hub navigation structure (Company Hub, My Workspace, Departments, Management, Administration) is fully functional. The header shows organization name from DB settings which may still show old name - this is dynamic and can be changed via Organization Settings.

Login_Page_Branding.sign_in_subtitle: PASS - Shows 'Sign in to your workspace'

Hub_Buttons_Visibility.company_hub: PASS - Button visible with Building2 icon
Hub_Buttons_Visibility.my_workspace: PASS - Button visible with UserCircle icon
Hub_Buttons_Visibility.departments: PASS - Button visible with Factory icon
Hub_Buttons_Visibility.management: PASS - Button visible with Briefcase icon
Hub_Buttons_Visibility.administration: PASS - Button visible with Settings icon

Departments_Hub_Navigation.projects_section: PASS - Contains Dashboard, Projects & Services, Work Planner, AMC Management, Project Reports, Calibration Services, Service Reports, Dept. Requirements, Billing, Reports

features_verified: Login page displays 'Workhub Enerzia' branding correctly
All 5 main hub buttons visible in sidebar
Company Hub navigation works with all 9 links
My Workspace hub navigation works with all 10 links
Departments hub shows 8 department sub-sections (Projects, Accounts, Sales, Purchase, Exports, Finance, HR & Admin, Operations)
Each department has expandable sub-menu with relevant links
Management hub shows Payment Approvals and Reports Center
Administration hub shows all 6 admin links
Navigation links route to correct pages without errors
PWA manifest updated with new branding
